mapper.select: SELECT TES.SUBJECT_NAME , TES.SUBJECT_CUT_OFF_SCORE , TESR.SUBJECT_SCORE , CASE WHEN TESR.PASS_STATUS = 1 THEN '합격' ELSE '과락' END AS PASS_YN FROM TB_EXAM_ALL_RESULT TEAR LEFT JOIN TB_EXAM_SUBJECT_RESULT TESR ON TEAR.IDX = TESR.EXAM_RESULT_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_EXAM_SUBJECT TES ON TES.IDX = TESR.SUBJECT_IDX WHERE TEAR.IDX = #{idx} AND TEAR.EXAM_RESULT_TOKEN = #{token}
SELECT TEAR.AVERAGE_SCORE , CASE WHEN TEAR.PASS_STATUS = 1 THEN '합격' ELSE '과락' END AS PASS_YN FROM TB_EXAM_ALL_RESULT TEAR WHERE TEAR.IDX = #{idx} AND TEAR.EXAM_RESULT_TOKEN = #{token}
